00021 vector<string> stringSplit(string str, string delim)
00022 {
00023         vector<string> result;
00024         istringstream iss(str);
00025         string token;
00026         while (getline(iss, token, delim[0]))
00027         {
00028                 result.push_back(token);
00029         }
00030         return result;
00031 }

00041 vector<unsigned int> insertAndConvert2intVector(string line, Lexicon& lex, SingleCount& sinlgesObject)
00042 {
00043         vector<string>words = stringSplit(line, " ");
00044                         
00045         vector<unsigned int> result(words.size(), 0);
00046         
00047         //put all words of the sentence in source language-lexicon and the value of the word into the lang-object
00048         unsigned int i;
00049         for (i=0; i<words.size(); i++)
00050         {
00051                 unsigned int val = lex.insert(words[i]);
00052                 sinlgesObject.insert(val);
00053                 result[i] = val;
00054         }
00055         return result;
00056 }

00067 void showFreq( PairCount& pairs, SingleCount& singlesF, SingleCount& singlesE, Lexicon& f, Lexicon& e)
00068 {
00069         for (pairs.begin(); !pairs.isEnd(); pairs.next())
00070         {
00071                 pair<unsigned int, unsigned int> wordpair = pairs.current();
00072                 double relFreq_f = -log(((double)pairs.getFreq(wordpair))/((double)singlesF.getFreq(wordpair.first)));
00073                 double relFreq_e = -log(((double)pairs.getFreq(wordpair))/((double)singlesE.getFreq(wordpair.second)));
00074                 cout << relFreq_f << " " << relFreq_e << " # " << f.getWord(wordpair.first) << " # " << e.getWord(wordpair.second) << endl;
00075         }
00076 }
